modules.title: Preparation Pt. 1
modules.detail: In this module, you will be providing consent to participate in this study.

steps.title: Read Consent Form
steps.description: Please review the consent form carefully.

steps.title: Sign Agreement
steps.description: Provide your electronic signature if you agree.

modules.title: Preparation Pt. 2
modules.detail: Provide demographic and geographic details for analysis.

steps.title: Demographic Information
steps.description: Report age, occupation, and household details.

steps.title: Geographic Information
steps.description: Specify residential location and mobility range.

steps.title: Customize Avatar
steps.description: Adjust features to match your identity.

modules.title: Step 1: Structured Survey
modules.description: Assess urban lifestyle and housing preferences.
modules.detail: Collect data on mobility patterns, residential choices, and urban engagement.

steps.title: Daily Mobility Patterns
steps.description: Document commute modes, frequency, and constraints.

steps.title: Residential Preferences
steps.description: Report housing conditions and neighborhood selection criteria.

steps.title: Public Spaces & Policy
steps.description: Evaluate access to green spaces, transit, and urban governance.

modules.title: Step 2: Causal Analysis
modules.description: Analyze the causal relationships in your urban decisions.
modules.detail: Through an interactive dialogue, we'll explore and visualize the cause-and-effect relationships in your urban lifestyle choices.

steps.title: Decision Description
steps.description: Describe your recent urban lifestyle decisions and their motivations.

steps.title: Causal Analysis
steps.description: Explore the relationships between different factors in your decisions through an interactive causal graph.

steps.title: Review Insights
steps.description: Understand the patterns and connections in your decision-making process.
